methods.Synopsis: Returns the authorizing user's profile information

parameters.Name: schema
parameters.Description: Set this to 'true' to get results in Schema.org Person format

methods.Synopsis: Delivers a notification message to the authorizing user.

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: The MyGov id of the user you would like to send a notification to.

parameters.Name: subject
parameters.Description: The subject line of the notification.

methods.Synopsis: List all the tasks created by the calling application.
Create a new task for the user for this application.

parameters.Name: task[name]
parameters.Description: The name for the task that is being created.

parameters.Name: task[task_items_attributes]
parameters.Description: A list of task items to be associated with the task.  Task Items are pointers to forms using a form_id.

methods.Synopsis: All tasks and task items for a given task

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: The id for the task that you would like to get more information on.  Can be retrieved via /tasks.json
